Text: Re Spraberry Carbuerator Installation Cc Larry Finally got the documentation you sent in Jim Linville and I reviewed it Neither of us believe you need any authorization to do what you didare doing In our opinion there is no change to your grandfathered status nor a need to update your Title V permit Having said that by now you probably know that the Texas legislature seems intent on closing out grandfathered status as of September st Our view is that your reworked engines have a clear shot at coming in under the VERP entry to permitting I would also suggest you check the Standard Exemption No One way of the other you should plan to end the grandfather status of these engines soon On the Title V permit if you have a General Operating Permit most likely it will be due for renewal in the short term next year marks the th anniversary for most GOPs We suggest you incorporate any changes due to the engine reworks at that time If you have an issued SOP do the same If your SOP is still pending contact your Permit reviewer here at TNRCC for guidance So will this email answer your needs Regards Duncan Stewart

Re Spraberry Carbuerator Installation Cc Larry Finally got the documentation you sent in Jim Linville and I reviewed it Neither of us believe you need any authorization to do what you didare doing In our opinion there is no change to your grandfathered status nor a need to update your Title V permit Having said that by now you probably know that the Texas legislature seems intent on closing out grandfathered status as of September st Our view is that your reworked engines have a clear shot at coming in under the VERP entry to permitting I would also suggest you check the Standard Exemption No One way of the other you should plan to end the grandfather status of these engines soon On the Title V permit if you have a General Operating Permit most likely it will be due for renewal in the short term next year marks the th anniversary for most GOPs We suggest you incorporate any changes due to the engine reworks at that time If you have an issued SOP do the same If your SOP is still pending contact your Permit reviewer here at TNRCC for guidance So will this email answer your needs Regards Duncan Stewart
